SeleniumIQ Docs

AI-powered Selenium testing companion for IntelliJ IDEA.

Plugin Repo ↗

SeleniumIQ Documentation Hub

Welcome to the official docs for the SeleniumIQ IntelliJ plugin. Use this site to master AI-assisted locator generation, stay aligned with releases, and file documentation updates.

What You Can Do Here

  • Learn quickly with onboarding checklists and guided workflows
  • Track releases via the public changelog synchronized with the plugin repo
  • Escalate issues through standardized templates for bugs, features, and docs
  • Compare tiers to understand which premium plan unlocks specific capabilities
  • Troubleshoot fast using curated fixes for the most common setup snags

Key Resources

  • Plugin source: JirakJ/selenium-iq-plugin
  • JetBrains Marketplace: SeleniumIQ Listing
  • Documentation issues: File an issue

Latest Release Highlights (v1.1.2)

  • Removed the IDE upper-bound so future IntelliJ builds stay compatible
  • Updated premium pricing copy to reflect 2025 tiers
  • Headless runs now skip the welcome dialog, removing CI flakiness

Quick Links

Topic Description
Getting Started Install and configure SeleniumIQ in under 5 minutes
Feature Guide Deep dive into AI locators, healing, prediction, and dashboards
Premium Tiers Compare Free, Individual, Team, and Enterprise plans
Troubleshooting Fix missing tool windows, AI errors, and CI hangs
FAQ Answers to licensing, telemetry, and support questions
Contributing Propose doc changes or contribute to the plugin
Issue Tracker Understand the labeling strategy and templates

Need something else? Open a docs issue and tag it with needs-info—the triage bot will guide you through the next steps.
